name: @Atlasize
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script to turn a volumetric dataset into an AFNI atlas

inputs.description: Mark DSET as being in space SPACE
inputs.name: Space

inputs.description: Labels and keys are in text file FILE. cLAB is the index of column containing labels, vVAL is the index of column containing keys (1st column is indexed at 0)
inputs.name: Label File

inputs.description: Set column delimiter for -lab_file option. Default is ' ' (space), but you can set your own. ';' for example.
inputs.name: Label File Delimiter

inputs.description: Additionally, allow for another column of long names for regions, e.g., amygdala for AMY. cLONGNAME is the starting column for the long name continuing to the last name of the output.
inputs.name: Long Names

inputs.description: Limit long names to nth column
inputs.name: Last Longname Column

inputs.description: Set the atlas type where TP is 'S' for subject-based and 'G' for group-based atlases, respectively.
inputs.name: Atlas Type

inputs.description: A description for the atlas. Default is 'My Atlas'
inputs.name: Atlas Description

inputs.description: Name for the atlas. Default name is based on prefix of DSET.
inputs.name: Atlas Name

inputs.description: Back up the dataset if it already exists in the custom atlas directory and allows an overwrite
inputs.name: Auto Backup

inputs.description: Add center of mass coordinates to atlas
inputs.name: Centers

inputs.description: Choose Icent, Dcent, or cm for different ways to compute centers
inputs.name: Center Type

inputs.description: Calculate center of mass locations for each ROI using a subset of voxels. Useful for atlases with identical labels in both hemispheres.
inputs.name: Center Mask

inputs.description: Skip regions without any voxels in the dataset
inputs.name: Skip No Voxels

inputs.description: Open webpage with help for this program
inputs.name: Help Web

inputs.description: Open -help output in a GUI editor
inputs.name: Help View

inputs.description: List all of the options for this script
inputs.name: All Options

inputs.description: Search for lines containing WORD in -help output. Search is approximate.
inputs.name: Help Find

output-files.description: Generated NIML file for the atlas
output-files.name: NIML File
